t: Brands Are Simply Guests On Amazon's Platform, And That's OK
s: October 12, 2018 - Amazon’s recent push to highlight its own private-label products is making many branded manufacturers uncomfortable. While Amazon has been quietly building its suite of private-label brands for years, there's now a more obvious strategy to make those products visible to customers.

t: Are Private Brands Key To Beating Amazon?
s: November 1, 2018 - As Amazon continues to gobble up market share in most product categories, many retailers find themselves on their heels desperately seeking an antidote to Amazon's growing dominance. In addition to improving digital shopping many retailers are turning to private brands as a potential antidote.
